mapper.insert: insert into product(pr_code, pr_thumb, pr_title, pr_content, pr_spec, pr_price, pr_ca_name) values(#{pr_code},#{pr_thumb},#{pr_title},#{pr_content},#{pr_spec},#{pr_price},#{pr_ca_name})
mapper.update: update category set ca_count = ca_count+1 where ca_name = #{ca_name}
mapper.select: select * from product where (pr_title like concat('%',#{search},'%') or pr_code like concat('%',#{search},'%')) and pr_ca_name like concat('%',#{pr_ca_name},'%') order by pr_ca_name limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(*) from product where (pr_title like concat('%',#{search},'%') or pr_code like concat('%',#{search},'%')) and pr_ca_name like concat('%',#{pr_ca_name},'%')
